songs.title: Lemonade
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Midtown
Gang, gang, we can get it cracking, gang, crackin'
Double R full shit, bitch
Rug-Rat for life, man, you already know how we rocking, man
EBK, bitch, ATK, bitch, ABK bitch
We can get it crackin', we could get it crackin, Lil' Tay-K, I'm 'bout that action
We can get it crackin', we could get it crackin, Lil' Tay-K, I'm 'bout that action

[Verse]
Bitch tryna get wife'd, but my dick she can get up (She can get hit up)
Smoke about a thot, if you want it, we could get up (We could get it up)
Locked down on a boot, but lil' Tay-K had to get up (I had to get up)
Bitch want my loot, what she want, she can't get none (Can't get none)
Chicken noodle soup, choppa cook a nigga shit up (Choppa cook a nigga up)
I don't want no love, lil' bitch, I'm tryna get a nut (I'm tryna get a nut)
And my bullets blue, lil' bitch yeah they Cripped up (My bullets Cripped up)
But I'm with my blood, swear to god we gon' rip some (And my blood rip some)
I'm a Rugrat, if I want it, I'ma get some
Got my finger prints on some hollow-tips, shawty lick some (And shawty lick some)
Fuck buyin' that shit, nigga we gon' lick some (Bitch, we lick some)
Fuck shootin' one time, nigga we gon' rip some (Bitch, we rip some)

[Chorus]
She drinks lemonade, I drink Lipton (I drink lipton)
Juggs are Minute Maid, nigga come and get some (Come get some)
Put the thooka down, pussy nigga put your fist up (Nigga bitch)
Call up Dee, VIP, we might have to kick some
Lemonade, I drink Lipton (Beep)
She drinks lemonade, I drink Lipton (Gang, gang)
Choppa put bullets in your system (Rug-Rat, gang!)
Choppa put bullets in your system
I can't get caught lackin', bitch, it's not in my system
She drinks lemonade, I drink Lipton
Codeine, promethazine, in my fuckin' system
I can't get caught lackin' bitch, it's not in my system

[Outro]
It's the system, bitch it's the system (It's the system)
I'm just tryna ball like a motherfuckin' Piston (Like a fucking Piston)
Call up Dee, VIP, we might have to kick some (We might have to fuckin' kick some)
Choppa put bullets in your system (In your fuckin' system)
